Sentencas: The system of chromia-forming alloy/Sr-doped LaMnO3 (LSM) electrode/3 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 (TZ3Y) electrolyte has been investigated at 900 degrees C in air under cathodic polarization conditions.
Titulo: Deposition of chromium species on Sr-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Deposition of chromium species was found to occur preferentially at the TZ3Y electrolyte surface, forming a deposit ring around the edge of the LSM electrode coating.
Titulo: Deposition of chromium species on Sr-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The width of the ring was about 60 mu m for an LSM electrode polarized for about 50 h. Overpotential (eta) increases with polarization time.
Titulo: Deposition of chromium species on Sr-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In contrast to eta electrode interface resistance (R-E) measured under open circuit conditions decreases initially after passing the current and remains almost constant with polarization.
Titulo: Deposition of chromium species on Sr-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that the deposition process of chromium species may not be dominated by electrochemical reduction processes in competition with O-2 reduction at an early stage of polarization.
Titulo: Deposition of chromium species on Sr-doped LaMnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells
